description.value: You have taken it upon yourself to learn the ways of combat to aid with your tasks, perhaps in a role as a corrector. You are trained with the @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Composite Shortbow]{Composite Shortbow}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Glaive]{Glaive}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longspear]{Longspear}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Longsword]{Longsword}, @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Shortbow]{Shortbow}, and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Spear]{Spear}. You also gain access to all uncommon conrasu weapons(@Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Buugeng]{Buugeng}). For the purpose of determining your proficiency, martial conrasu weapons are simple weapons and advanced conrasu weapons are martial weapons.
